verses.verse: And Moses<WH4872> went<WH3212> and spake<WH1696> these words<WH1697> unto all Israel<WH3478>.

And he said<WH559> unto them<WH3967>, I am a hundred and twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> this day<WH3117>; I can<WH3201> no more go out<WH3318> and come in<WH935>: and Jehovah<WH3068> hath said<WH559> unto me<WH5674>, Thou shalt not go over this Jordan<WH3383>.

Jehovah <WH3068> thy God<WH430>, he will go over<WH5674> before<WH6440> thee<WH8045>; he will destroy these nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> thee<WH3423>, and thou shalt dispossess them<WH3091>: and Joshua, he shall go over<WH5674> before<WH6440> thee<WH3068>, as Jehovah hath spoken<WH1696>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> will do<WH6213> unto them as he did<WH6213> to Sihon<WH5511> and to Og<WH5747>, the kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, and unto their land<WH776>; whom he destroyed<WH8045>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> will deliver them up<WH5414> before you<WH6440>, and ye shall do<WH6213> unto them according unto all the commandment<WH4687> which I have commanded you<WH6680>.

Be strong<WH2388> and of good courage<WH553>, fear<WH3372> not<WH6206>, nor be affrighted at them<WH6440>: for Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, he it is that doth go<WH1980> with thee<WH7503>; he will not fail thee<WH5800>, nor forsake thee.

And Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> unto Joshua<WH3091>, and said<WH559> unto him in the sight<WH5869> of all Israel<WH3478>, Be strong<WH2388> and of good courage<WH553>: for thou shalt go<WH935> with this people<WH5971> into the land<WH776> which Jehovah<WH3068> hath sworn<WH7650> unto their fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> them<WH5157>; and thou shalt cause them to inherit it.

And Jehovah<WH3068>, he it is that doth go<WH1980> before<WH6440> thee<WH7503>; he will be with thee, he will not fail thee<WH5800>, neither forsake thee<WH3372>: fear not<WH2865>, neither be dismayed.

And Moses<WH4872> wrote<WH3789> this law<WH8451>, and delivered<WH5414> it unto the priests<WH3548> the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878>, that bare<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and unto all the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>.

And Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> them<WH559>, saying, At the end<WH7093> of every seven<WH7651> years<WH8141>, in the set<WH4150> time of the year<WH8141> of release<WH8059>, in the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles<WH5521>,

when all Israel<WH3478> is come<WH935> to appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which he shall choose<WH977>, thou shalt read<WH7121> this law<WH8451> before all Israel<WH3478> in their hearing<WH241>.

Assemble <WH6950> the<WH6950> people<WH5971>, the men<WH582> and the women<WH802> and the little ones<WH2945>, and thy sojourner<WH1616> that is within thy gates<WH8179>, that they may hear<WH8085>, and that they may learn<WH3925>, and fear<WH3372> Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> all the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451>;

and that their children<WH1121>, who have not known<WH3045>, may hear<WH8085>, and learn<WH3925> to fear<WH3372> Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, as long as<WH3117> ye live<WH2416> in the land<WH127> whither ye go over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383> to possess it<WH3423>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Behold<WH3117>, thy days approach<WH7126> that thou must die<WH4191>: call<WH7121> Joshua<WH3091>, and present<WH3320> yourselves in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, that I may give him a charge<WH6680>. And Moses<WH4872> and Joshua<WH3091> went<WH3212>, and presented<WH3320> themselves in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> in the Tent<WH168> in a pillar<WH5982> of cloud<WH6051>: and the pillar<WH5982> of cloud<WH6051> stood<WH5975> over the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Behold<WH7901>, thou shalt sleep with thy fathers<WH1>; and this people<WH5971> will rise up<WH6965>, and play the harlot<WH2181> after<WH310> the strange<WH5236> gods<WH430> of the land<WH776>, whither they go<WH935> to be among<WH7130> them<WH5800>, and will forsake me<WH6565>, and break my covenant<WH1285> which I have made with them<WH3772>.

Then my anger<WH639> shall be kindled<WH2734> against them in that day<WH3117>, and I will forsake<WH5800> them<WH5641>, and I will hide my face<WH6440> from them<WH398>, and they shall be devoured, and many<WH7227> evils<WH7451> and troubles<WH6869> shall come upon<WH4672> them<WH559>; so that they will say in that day<WH3117>, Are not these evils<WH7451> come<WH4672> upon us because our God<WH430> is not among us<WH7130>?

And I will surely<WH5641> hide<WH5641> my face<WH6440> in that day<WH3117> for all the evil<WH7451> which they shall have wrought<WH6213>, in that<WH3588> they are turned<WH6437> unto other<WH312> gods<WH430>.

Now therefore write<WH3789> ye this song<WH7892> for you<WH3925>, and teach thou it the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>: put<WH7760> it in their mouths<WH6310>, that this song<WH7892> may be a witness<WH5707> for me against the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

For when I shall have brought<WH935> them into the land<WH127> which I sware<WH7650> unto their fathers<WH1>, flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>, and they shall have eaten<WH398> and filled<WH7646> themselves<WH1878>, and waxed fat; then will they turn<WH6437> unto other<WH312> gods<WH430>, and serve<WH5647> them<WH5006>, and despise me<WH6565>, and break my covenant<WH1285>.

And it shall come to pass<WH7227>, when many evils<WH7451> and troubles<WH6869> are come upon<WH4672> them<WH7892>, that this song shall testify<WH6030> before<WH6440> them as a witness<WH5707>; for it shall not be forgotten<WH7911> out of the mouths<WH6310> of their seed<WH2233>: for I know<WH3045> their imagination<WH3336> which they frame<WH6213> this day<WH3117>, before I have brought<WH935> them into the land<WH776> which I sware<WH7650>.
So Moses<WH4872> wrote<WH3789> this song<WH7892> the same day<WH3117>, and taught<WH3925> it the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And he gave Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126> a charge<WH6680>, and said<WH559>, Be strong<WH2388> and of good courage<WH553>; for thou shalt bring<WH935> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> into the land<WH776> which I sware unto them<WH7650>: and I will be with thee.
And it came to pass<WH4872>, when Moses had made an end<WH3615> of writing<WH3789> the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451> in a book<WH5612>, until they were finished<WH8552>,
that Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> the Levites<WH3881>, that bare<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Jehovah<WH3068>, saying<WH559>,

Take <WH3947> this book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451>, and put<WH7760> it by the side<WH6654> of the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, that it may be there for a witness against thee<WH5707>.

For I know<WH3045> thy rebellion<WH4805>, and thy stiff<WH7186> neck<WH6203>: behold<WH2416>, while I am yet alive with you this day<WH3117>, ye have been rebellious<WH4784> against Jehovah<WH3068>; and how much more after<WH310> my death<WH4194>?

Assemble <WH6950> unto me all the elders<WH2205> of your tribes<WH7626>, and your officers<WH7860>, that I may speak<WH1696> these words<WH1697> in their ears<WH241>, and call<WH5749> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776> to witness against them<WH5749>.

For I know<WH3045> that after<WH310> my death<WH4194> ye will utterly<WH7843> corrupt<WH7843> yourselves<WH5493>, and turn aside from the way<WH1870> which I have commanded<WH6680> you<WH7451>; and evil will befall<WH7122> you in the latter<WH319> days<WH3117>; because ye will do<WH6213> that which is evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Jehovah<WH3068>, to provoke him to anger<WH3707> through the work<WH4639> of your hands<WH3027>.
And Moses<WH4872> spake<WH1696> in the ears<WH241> of all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel<WH3478> the words<WH1697> of this song<WH7892>, until they were finished<WH8552>.
